about_the_game:
Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi is a charming game that includes over 160 tracks of various music genres to help you focus. Customize and decorate your cozy little room while utilizing convenient features to create the perfect environment for concentration.

Relaxing Soundtracks to Enhance Focus

Immerse yourself in a soothing atmosphere with a collection of calming music.
Choose from over 160 tracks spanning various genres to match your mood and preferences.

A Small and Lovely Focus Tool

This game can be placed on one side of your monitor, helping to enhance your productivity.
Use the music player, notepad, to-do list, and timer to create a healthy and vibrant work environment.
With its lightweight design, it runs smoothly even on laptops.

A Personalized Cozy Room

Design and decorate your very own cozy and beautiful space.
Your adorable character will enjoy a peaceful and comfortable time in this warm setting.

Key Features

  • Play ambient sounds like rain to enhance your immersive work environment.

  • Customize your character’s appearance with various hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to create a unique look.

  • Gain experience over time, level up, earn points, and unlock new decorative items to personalize your space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
